title: Privacy Coin Zcash Drops 20% as Core Dev Team Departs Electric Coin Company
full_text: Privacy Coin Zcash Drops 20% as Core Dev Team Departs Electric Coin Company. The fears of centralizing forces in crypto are creating a lot of skittishness.. Zcash, a privacy-focused cryptocurrency based around the use of zero-knowledge proofs, saw its price fall more than 20% overnight following the abrupt resignation of its entire core development team … [+4520 chars]
